import { useState } from "react" import fillForm from "../assets/images/herocontactpage.png" import { Helmet } from "react-helmet" import TransitionEffect from "../components/TransitionEffect" import { Layout } from '../components/Layout' const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", message: "" }) function handleChange(e) { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }) } function clearForm() { setFormData({ name: "", email: "", message: "" }) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log("form submitted", formData) clearForm(); } return ( <> Contact
